CustomProfile.Description: Ace Driver 3: Final Turn is Namco’s third entry in the Ace Driver series. Debuting at the 2008 AOU tradeshow, this arcade racing game builds on the 1994 original with updated courses and high‑speed car racing. Players compete to outmaneuver rivals around winding circuits, drifting through corners and accelerating down straights to take the checkered flag. It retains the competitive spirit of its predecessors while adding new tracks and improvements for modern arcades.
